name: The Gargoyle Attacks
description:
plays with z and left/right arrow keys

Basically, you are a gargoyle, (actually closer to a harpy now that I think of it lol), and you have to capture passing humans (by grabbing their heads with your feet and bringing them back to your cave), if you fall too fast or get hit by an arrow it's game over.

Submission for the Trijam 173!

Made in just under 3 hours, here's a short video with a little gameplay and the full process sped up: 

I'm really content with the movement itself but the gameplay loop feels a bit lacking

I couldn't keep my promise regarding adding sound to this one :(, this is yet another silent game.
